page.title: 05 LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: Two annual events in both Springside and Crosshouse are the summer fayre and the gala day.Both town have a gala queen who is usually chosen from the girls attending the local primary school.Some of the events which take place during the Springside gala week are a treasure hunt, a pram race and also a fancy dress parade. The gala week finishes up with a gala parade and the crowning of the Gala Queen.A new event which has been introduced in this area is a summer play scheme.This involves various activities being organised which the local children can take part in. The activities usually take place over two weeks. The Brownies and Guides from this area recently took part in the Jamboree held in Dean Park, Kilmarnock to celebrate 75 years of Guiding.
